fr.cnes.doi.plugin.impl.db

Class DefaultLDAPImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cnes.doi.plugin.AbstractAuthenticationPluginHelper
      • fr.cnes.doi.plugin.impl.db.DefaultLDAPImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAuthenticationDBHelper, PluginConfiguration, PluginMetadata

    public final class DefaultLDAPImpl
extends AbstractAuthenticationPluginHelper
    Implementation of the LDAP.
    Author:
    Jean-Christophe Malapert (jean-christophe.malapert@cnes.fr)

                                             throws AuthenticationAccessException
        Search on LDAP all users which are in the group Consts.LDAP_PROJECT.

        Returns:

      • getLdapUsers

        private List<AuthSystemUser> getLdapUsers(DirContext context,
                                          String gidNumber)
                                   throws NamingException
        Search on LDAP all users which are in the group Consts.LDAP_PROJECT in a LDAP group
        Parameters:
        context - context
        gidNumber - LDAP group ID
        Returns:
        all LDAP users which are in the group Consts.LDAP_PROJECT for a specific LDAP group
        Throws:
        NamingException - Exception
